alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 9:22PM MDT until August 31 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Washington County in southwestern Utah... * Until 945 PM MDT * At 922 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St George, or 14 miles northeast of Virgin River Gorge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St George, Washington, Hurricane, Santa Clara, Sand Hollow State Park, Quail Creek State Park, Ivins, Bloomington and Snow Canyon State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 2 and 21. Utah Route 18 between mile markers 0 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
